iti15:2.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekasamyojanampi samanupassami yena samyojanena samyutta satta digharattam sandhavanti samsaranti yathayidam, bhikkhave, tanhasamyojanam.
iti15:2.2: Tanhasamyojanena hi, bhikkhave, samyutta satta digharattam sandhavanti samsaranti”ti.
iti15:5.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
